topics.body:
walking home from school today i met an old man with a pale, scabby eye that said "hello" to me. i don't know if it was the noise of the cars passing or i just didn't say hey loud enough, but he yelled at me to say hello. after i said that i did he apologized and said something else when i was a few metres away from him

of course at that distance the cars drowned everything out, and i can't help but think i'll never stop wondering what he said
